00035 DATData::DATData()
00036 {
00037         globalGridStatus = 0;
00038         dsPixel = 0;
00039         dsSMPixel = 0;
00040         dsStats = 0;
00041         Clear();
00042 }
00043 
00044 DATData::DATData(const std::string &filename) 
00045 { 
00046         globalGridStatus = 0;
00047         dsPixel = 0;
00048         dsStats = 0;
00049         dsSMPixel = 0;
00050         Clear();
00051         SetFilename(filename);
00052         genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId(SCAN_ACQUISITION_DATA_TYPE);
00053         DataGroupHeader dcHdr(DAT_DATAGROUP);
00054         genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(dcHdr);
00055 }
00056 
00057 DATData::~DATData() 
00058 { 
00059         Clear(); 
00060 }
00061 
00062 void DATData::Clear()
00063 {
00064         if (dsPixel){ dsPixel->Delete();  dsPixel = 0; }
00065         if (dsSMPixel){ dsSMPixel->Delete();  dsSMPixel = 0; }
00066         if (dsStats){ dsStats->Delete(); dsStats = 0; }
00067         globalGrid.Clear();
00068         subgrids.clear();
00069 
00070         genericData.Header().Clear();
00071         setPixelMetaData = false;
00072         setStatsMetaData = false;
00073         cachedRows = -1;
00074         cachedCols = -1;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void DATData::SetFilename(const std::string &p)
00078 {
00079         genericData.Header().SetFilename(p);
00080 }

00082 std::string DATData::GetFilename()
00083 {
00084         return genericData.Header().GetFilename();
00085 }

00087 void DATData::SetPixelCount(int32_t ln)
00088 {
00089         DataSetHeader dpHdr;
00090         dpHdr.SetRowCnt(ln);
00091         dpHdr.SetName(DAT_PIXEL);
00092         dpHdr.AddUShortColumn(DAT_PIXEL);
00093         if(setPixelMetaData)
00094         {
00095                 UpdateDataSetRowCount(dpHdr);
00096         }
00097         else
00098         {
00099                 InsertDataSetHeader(dpHdr);
00100                 setPixelMetaData = true;
00101         }
00102 }
00103 
00104 void DATData::SetStatsCount(int32_t ln)
00105 {
00106         DataSetHeader dpHdr;
00107         dpHdr.SetRowCnt(ln);
00108         dpHdr.SetName(DAT_STATS);
00109         dpHdr.AddUShortColumn(MinIntensityColName);
00110         dpHdr.AddUShortColumn(MaxIntensityColName);
00111         if(setStatsMetaData)
00112         {
00113                 UpdateDataSetRowCount(dpHdr);
00114         }
00115         else
00116         {
00117                 InsertDataSetHeader(dpHdr);
00118                 setStatsMetaData = true;
00119         }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void DATData::UpdateDataSetRowCount(const DataSetHeader &hdr)
00123 {
00124         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(0);
00125         bool found = false;
00126         int sz = dcHdr->GetDataSetCnt();
00127         for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00128         {
00129                 DataSetHeader* dpHdr = &dcHdr->GetDataSet(i);
00130                 if(dpHdr->GetName() == hdr.GetName())
00131                 {
00132                         dpHdr->SetRowCnt(hdr.GetRowCnt());
00133                         found = true;
00134                         break;
00135                 }
00136         }
00137         if(!found)
00138         {
00139                 InsertDataSetHeader(hdr);
00140         }
00141 }
00142 
00143 void DATData::InsertDataSetHeader(const DataSetHeader &hdr)
00144 {
00145         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(0);
00146         dcHdr->AddDataSetHdr(hdr);
00147 }

00159 /*
00160  * Get the array id.
00161  */
00162 AffymetrixGuidType DATData::GetArrayId()
00163 {
00164         AffymetrixGuidType guid;
00165         GenericDataHeader *parentGDH = GetParentArrayGenericDataHeader();
00166         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00167         if (parentGDH->FindNameValParam(ARRAY_ID_PARAM_NAME, nvt))
00168         {
00169                 guid = nvt.GetValueAscii();
00170         }
00171 
00172         return guid;
00173 }
00174 
00175 /*
00176  * Set the array id.
00177  */
00178 void DATData::SetArrayId(AffymetrixGuidType& value)
00179 {
00180         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00181         nvt.SetName(ARRAY_ID_PARAM_NAME);
00182         nvt.SetValueAscii(value, AFFY_GUID_LEN);
00183         GenericDataHeader *parentGDH = GetParentArrayGenericDataHeader();
00184         parentGDH->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00185 }

00215 float DATData::GetPixelSize()
00216 {
00217         float result = 0.0f;
00218         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00219         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00220         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(PIXEL_SIZE_PARAM_NAME, paramType))
00221         {
00222                 result = paramType.GetValueFloat();
00223         }
00224         return result;
00225 }

00269 int32_t DATData::GetRows()
00270 {
00271         if (cachedRows == -1)
00272                 cachedRows = GetInt32FromGenericHdr(ROWS_PARAM_NAME);
00273         return cachedRows;

00301 std::wstring DATData::GetWStringFromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name)
00302 {
00303         std::wstring result;
00304         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00305         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00306         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00307         {
00308                 result = paramType.GetValueText();
00309         }
00310         return result;
00311 }
00312 
00313 void DATData::SetWStringToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, const std::wstring value, int32_t reserve)
00314 {
00315         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00316         paramType.SetName(name);
00317         paramType.SetValueText(value, reserve);
00318         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00319         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00320 }

00343 /*
00344  * Fills the array with pixel values
00345 */
00346 bool DATData::GetPixels(u_int16_t* pixelBuffer, u_int32_t startRow, u_int32_t rowCnt)
00347 {
00348         PreparePixelSet();
00349         if (dsPixel && dsPixel->IsOpen())
00350         {
00351                 if (rowCnt+startRow <= (u_int32_t)GetRows())
00352                 {
00353                         int32_t startIdx = startRow*GetCols();
00354                         int32_t count = rowCnt*GetCols();
00355                         if (startIdx+count <= dsPixel->Rows())
00356                         {
00357                                 int32_t returned = dsPixel->GetDataRaw(0, startIdx, count, pixelBuffer);
00358                                 return (count == returned);
00359                         }
00360                 }
00361         }
00362         return false;
00363 }
00364 
00365 /*
00366  * Fills the array with requested pixel values. 
00367  */
00368 bool DATData::GetPixels(u_int16_t* pixelBuffer, u_int32_t startRow, u_int32_t startCol, u_int32_t rowCnt, u_int32_t colCnt)
00369 {
00370         PrepareSmallMemoryPixelSet();
00371         if (dsSMPixel && dsSMPixel->IsOpen())
00372         {
00373                 if (rowCnt+startRow <= (u_int32_t)GetRows() && colCnt+startCol <= (u_int32_t)GetCols())
00374                 {
00375                         u_int16_t* pb = pixelBuffer;
00376 
00377                         // Copy one row at a time into the buffer.
00378                         for (int32_t row = startRow; row < startRow+rowCnt; ++row)
00379                         {
00380                                 int32_t dsRow = row*GetCols() + startCol;
00381                                 if (dsRow+colCnt <= dsSMPixel->Rows())
00382                                 {
00383                                         int32_t returned = dsSMPixel->GetDataRaw(0, dsRow, colCnt, pb);
00384                                         if (returned != colCnt)
00385                                                 return false;
00386 
00387                                         pb += colCnt;
00388                                 }
00389                         }
00390 
00391                         return true;
00392                 }
00393         }
00394         return false;
00395 }
00396 
00397 bool DATData::GetRange(u_int16_t& min, u_int16_t& max)
00398 {
00399         PrepareStatsSet();
00400         if (dsStats && dsStats->IsOpen())
00401         {
00402                 if (dsStats->Rows() > 0)
00403                 {
00404                         dsStats->GetData(0, 0, min);
00405                         dsStats->GetData(0, 1, max);
00406                         return true;
00407                 }
00408         }
00409         return false;
00410 }
00411 
00412 void DATData::PreparePixelSet()
00413 {
00414         PrepareSet(DAT_PIXEL, dsPixel);
00415 }
00416 
00417 void DATData::PrepareSmallMemoryPixelSet()
00418 {
00419         genericData.UseMemoryMapping(false);
00420         genericData.LoadEntireDataSetHint(false);
00421         PrepareSet(DAT_PIXEL, dsSMPixel);
00422         genericData.UseMemoryMapping(true);
00423 }
00424 
00425 void DATData::PrepareStatsSet()
00426 {
00427         PrepareSet(DAT_STATS, dsStats);
00428 }
00429 
00430 void DATData::PrepareSet(const std::wstring& name, DataSet*& ds)
00431 {
00432         if (ds == 0)
00433         {
00434                 ds = genericData.DataSet(DAT_DATAGROUP, name);
00435                 if (ds)
00436                         ds->Open();
00437         }
00438 }
00439 
00440 GenericDataHeader* DATData::GetParentArrayGenericDataHeader()
00441 {
00442         GenericDataHeader* parentGDH = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindParent(ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00443 
00444         if (parentGDH == 0)
00445         {
00446                 // Create a new parent GenericDataHeader and add to the current GenericDataHeader
00447                 GenericDataHeader gdh;
00448                 gdh.SetFileTypeId(ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00449                 genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(gdh);
00450                 parentGDH = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindParent(ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00451         }
00452 
00453         return parentGDH;
00454 }

00456 /*
00457  * Add a grid alignment algorithm parameter.
00458  */
00459 void DATData::AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(const ParameterNameValueType& nvt)
00460 {
00461         gridAlignParams.push_back(nvt);
00462 }
00463 
00464 /*
00465  * Remove all grid alignment algorithm parameters.
00466  */
00467 void DATData::ClearGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters()
00468 {
00469         gridAlignParams.clear();
00470 }
00471 
00472 /*
00473  * Return a grid alignment algorithm parameter given a name.
00474  */
00475 bool DATData::FindGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(const std::wstring& name, ParameterNameValueType& param)
00476 {
00477         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = gridAlignParams.begin(); ii != gridAlignParams.end(); ++ii)
00478         {
00479                 if (name == ii->GetName())
00480                 {
00481                         param = *ii;
00482                         return true;
00483                 }
00484         }
00485         return false;
00486 }
00487 
00488 /*
00489  * Return the grid alignment algorithm parameters.
00490  */
00491 void DATData::GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(ParameterNameValueTypeVector& algParams)
00492 {
00493         algParams = gridAlignParams;
00494 }
